resources.string: TMEIT for Android is developed by Wilhelm Svenselius for TMEIT. You can check out the source code, report bugs and feedback on GitHub.
The authorization code was rejected by the server. It may have expired. Try logging in again. Also, make sure you have the latest version of this app.
This authorization time code is not valid. Try logging in again. Also, make sure that you have the latest version of this app.
There was an error contacting the server. Please ensure you have Internet connectivity, then try again.
An unexpected error occurred while authenticating. Try again. If the issue persists, make sure you have the latest version of this app.
The authentication data is no longer valid. Try logging in again.
There is no network available. This app won\'t work without a network connection.
There was an error registering with Google\'s messaging service. Please ensure you have Internet connectivity, then try again.
There was an error registering with the notification service. Please ensure you have Internet connectivity, then try again.
In the future, there will be more options here for what types of notifications you will receive.
Go to TMEIT.se to check them out.
The server is still processing your request, please try again in a moment.
Your device does not support Google Play Services. Notifications are unavailable.
I don\'t have a KTH ID
Welcome! This seems to be your first time using this app. You will need to log in to an existing account.
There was an error contacting the server. Please ensure you have Internet connectivity, then try again.
An unexpected error occurred while downloading. Make sure you have the latest version of this app.
